content.text: Hello. I am Jason. I am a touring musician, but I also like to garden.
Hello Jason. I am Zoe. I love learning about my heritage and the Greek culture.
That is really cool. I am Italian-American.
Oh that is cool too. What are your favorite things about Italian culture?
I love the food and the music. I am a huge fan of Jason Mraz.
Oh I love Jason Mraz too! He is so talented.
Have you seen him in concert?
No, I have not. I would love to see him in concert one day.
You should! He puts on a great show.
I will definitely try to see him in concert one day.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to cook and bake. I also love to read and play video games.
That is cool. I like to cook and bake too. I also like to garden.
Oh that is cool. I have never tried gardening before.
You should try it. It is really fun.
I will definitely try it.
What are your plans for the day?
I am going to watch some YouTube videos about welding and then go for a walk in the park.
That sounds like a great day.
It will be.
